title: Blended Learning Design for Teacher Professional Development: Intermediate Social Studies Subject Focus

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based learning environment for pre-service and in-service teachers. Provides continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically produce social studies lesson modules according to blended learning design principles
Learners can create HTML-based educational content using platforms like eXe
Learners can design and apply effective formative assessment tools in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
